overview:
Working with internal and external clients, Steve Goodnetter helps stakeholders understand the complexities in communicating over multiple mediums and creates campaigns that reach their target audience.

Advise stakeholders on effective marketing techniques. Develop marketing and communications campaigns that satisfy client needs. Consultant on web site design and effectiveness. Analyze web metrics for opportunities and recommend changes. Leader in developing integrated marketing programs. Websites supported include www.seekandfind.com, www.amtonline.com, www.airportbusiness
